The decision came down to how best optimise Google's triumvirate of power( Eric Schmidt , Larry Page and Sergey Brin ) to become a more adaptable enterprise. Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured, Eric Schmidt said. Steve Ballmer announced the latest changes Wednesday in an e-mail to Microsoft employees. We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services, Steve Ballmer wrote. Satya Nadella "has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future."
